scripts.freePort8080: FOR /F "tokens=5 delims= " %P IN ('netstat -a -n -o ^| findstr ]:8080.*LISTENING') DO TaskKill.exe  /F /PID %P
scripts.mockBackgroundServer: npm run freePort8080 && START /B node ./src/server_mock/run.js > src/server_mock/server.log
scripts.cdev: npm run mockBackgroundServer && npm run dev
scripts.mdev: npm run serverMock && npm run dev
scripts.deployCopy: xcopy src\client\public c:\Apache\apache-tomcat-7.0.62\webapps\meete\public\ && xcopy src\client\assets c:\Apache\apache-tomcat-7.0.62\webapps\meete\assets && xcopy src\client\css c:\Apache\apache-tomcat-7.0.62\webapps\meete\css && copy src\client\index.html c:\Apache\apache-tomcat-7.0.62\webapps\meete
scripts.tomcatRestart: npm run tomcatShutdown && npm run tomcatStartup
scripts.deploy: npm run deployDrop && npm run deployCopy && npm run tomcatStartup
scripts.redeploy: npm run deployDrop && npm run deployCopy
